title: Didn't get LP for one of my games
body:
So when I went to bed last night I was coming off of 2 wins from 0 LP, totaling to around 30 LP, as I earn and lose about 15 LP per match. Today I won 3 games and lost 1, and am currently sitting at 48 LP. Basic math would suggest a net gain of around 30 LP, instead of 18.

Start at 30 LP

Lost 1 match, down to 15.

Win 3 more (~45 LP), up to 60.

I've been having really rough games lately so to me every LP counts. @Rito Please look into <3

replies.body: Every LP counts, I know it!  I looked into this for you and don't really see out of the ordinary.  I do see your last 3 games were 3 wins in a row which took you up to 48 LP.  if things still seem out of place, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can dig deeper and break things down with more context.  See you there!

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xw9ERJv3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-17T13:13:08.213+0000)
>
> Did you dodge Champ Select?

That's a good question, I certainly might have, but if I did would have been one time st the most, which certainly does not equate to at least 10 lp. A dodge is like 3-5 I believe?
